title: Ratan Tata ignited passion for EVs, inspired to set up Ola Electric: Bhavish Aggarwal
description: Bhavish Aggarwal revealed that Ratan Tata inspired him to start Ola Electric. Tata demonstrated his electric vehicle project to Aggarwal, sparking his interest. This began in 2017 and continued with Tata's mentorship and support. Tata's passing is a personal loss for Aggarwal, who admired his dedication and compassionate nature.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
